headline: NESLAB RECIRCULATING CHILLER 2000 WATT
categories.lvl2: Heating & Cooling  >  Baths and Chillers > Recirculating Chillers
specstable:
Manufacturer Neslab
Model HX-75 /115-volt
Cooling System
External Cooling Forced Air Cooled
Pump type/Model PD-2
Cooling Capacity 2,000 W (6,821 BTU/hr)
Minimum Temperature 5 ºC (41 ºF, 278.00 ºK)
Maximum Temperature 35 ºC (95 ºF, 308 ºK)
Temperature Control
Control Stability ± 1.000 ºC
Heat/Cool Controls
Control Type Digital Setpoint
Controller Manufacturer/Model Love Controller TS2-011
Min Flow 3 GPM (11.40 l/m)
Max Flow 4 GPM (15.20 l/m)
Minimum Pressure 5.000 PSI (344.77 mbar, 34,476.50 Pa)
Maximum Pressure 60.000 PSI (4,137.18 mbar, 413,718.00 Pa)
Capacity/Liquid 18.93 L (5.00 gal)
Compressor Horse Power 0.75 HP
Other Information

New PD-2 pump.
New Dwyer / Love Digital TS2-011 controller.
New refrigeration compressor.
Refrigerant Suva R-134.
Unit not to be used with Di-water.
Power plug Hubbell 20-amp #231A.

Power Requirements 115 V 16.8 A 60 Hz 1 Phase
